content.en: Algorithm validation: Scientists have been studying the accuracy and performance of various commercial algorithms used in radiation therapy treatment planning. These algorithms, such as Monte Carlo dose calculation engines and grid-based Boltzmann equation solvers, are being evaluated for their ability to calculate radiation doses for different types of beams and treatment techniques. The research aims to validate and improve these algorithms to ensure safe and effective radiation treatments for patients.
content.da: Algoritmevalidering: Forskere har undersøgt nøjagtigheden og ydeevnen af forskellige kommercielle algoritmer, der anvendes i planlægningen af strålebehandling. Disse algoritmer, såsom Monte Carlo-dosisberegningsmotorer og gitterbaserede Boltzmann-ligningsløsere, bliver evalueret for deres evne til at beregne stråledoser for forskellige typer af stråler og behandlingsmetoder. Forskningen har til formål at validere og forbedre disse algoritmer for at sikre sikre og effektive strålebehandlinger for patienter.
